text.autoconfig.okzoomer.option.smoothCa: interfers with Cinematic Mode but it shouldn't be anything negative.
text.autoconfig.okzoomer.option.smoothDi: The divisor used while applying smoothing,
smaller number zooms faster, bigger number zoom slower.
text.autoconfig.okzoomer.option.zoomMult: The multiplier applied to the FOV when zooming.
anything above that will break the FOV.
text.autoconfig.okzoomer.option.zoomTogg: Enables the ability to toggle zooming.
text.autoconfig.okzoomer.option.smoothTr: Enables Smooth Transitions when zooming in and out.
WARNING: It might be prone to breakage, be careful.
text.autoconfig.okzoomer.title: Ok Zoomer Config
